SEARCH
Package classes

Class PetriNet

java.lang.Object
classes.PetriNet
All Implemented Interfaces:
interfaces.IPetriNet
public class PetriNet extends Object implements interfaces.IPetriNet
PetriNet implements the IPetriNet interface, providing methods to manage places, transitions, and various arcs in a PetriNet, including adding, removing, and retrieving components.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PetriNet()
    Default constructor to initialize the PetriNet with empty lists of places and transitions.

    • getArcsPT

      public ArrayList<arcs.ArcPT> getArcsPT()
      Retrieves all ArcPT arcs in the PetriNet by iterating over each Transition and collecting its incoming arcs. Beware ! Includes ArcDrain and ArcZero
      Specified by:
      getArcsPT in interface interfaces.IPetriNet
      Returns:
      List of ArcPT objects.

    • checkAddArcExceptions

      public void checkAddArcExceptions(int w, classes.Place p, classes.Transition t) throws exception.NegativeException, exception.MissingPlaceException, exception.MissingTransitionException
      Checks common exceptions when adding an arc, such as negative weights or null references.
      Parameters:
      w - Weight of the arc.
      p - Place involved in the arc.
      t - Transition involved in the arc.
      Throws:
      exception.NegativeException - If the arc weight is negative.
      exception.MissingPlaceException - If the Place is null.
      exception.MissingTransitionException - If the Transition is null.

    • checkDuplicateArcTP

      public void checkDuplicateArcTP(classes.Place p, classes.Transition t) throws exception.DuplicateArcException
      Checks if an ArcTP already exists between the given Place and Transition.
      Parameters:
      p - The Place involved in the Arc.
      t - The Transition involved in the Arc.
      Throws:
      exception.DuplicateArcException - If an identical ArcTP already exists.

    • checkDuplicateArcPT

      public void checkDuplicateArcPT(classes.Place p, classes.Transition t) throws exception.DuplicateArcException
      Checks if an ArcPT already exists between the given Place and Transition.
      Parameters:
      p - The Place involved in the Arc.
      t - The Transition involved in the Arc.
      Throws:
      exception.DuplicateArcException - If an identical ArcPT already exists.

    • addPlace

      public classes.Place addPlace(int tokens) throws exception.NegativeException
      Adds a new Place with a specified number of tokens to the PetriNet.
      Specified by:
      addPlace in interface interfaces.IPetriNet
      Parameters:
      tokens - Initial token count for the Place.
      Returns:
      The created Place object.
      Throws:
      exception.NegativeException - If the token count is negative.

    • addTokens

      public void addTokens(classes.Place p, int tokens) throws exception.MissingPlaceException, exception.NegativeException
      Adds tokens to a specified Place already existing in the PetriNet
      Parameters:
      p - The Place to add tokens to
      tokens - The number of tokens to add
      Throws:
      exception.MissingPlaceException - If the specified Place is not in PetriNet
      exception.NegativeException - If the amount of tokens is negative

    • removeTokens

      public void removeTokens(classes.Place p, int tokens) throws exception.MissingPlaceException, exception.NegativeException
      Removes tokens to a specified Place already existing in the PetriNet
      Parameters:
      p - The Place to remove tokens to
      tokens - The number of tokens to remove
      Throws:
      exception.MissingPlaceException - If the specified Place is not in PetriNet
      exception.NegativeException - If the amount of tokens removed is negative or if by removing said amount of token, the place has a negative amount of tokens

    • addArcTP

      public arcs.ArcTP addArcTP(int w, classes.Place p, classes.Transition t) throws exception.NegativeException, exception.MissingPlaceException, exception.MissingTransitionException, exception.DuplicateArcException
      Adds an ArcTP (Transition to Place) to the PetriNet.
      Specified by:
      addArcTP in interface interfaces.IPetriNet
      Parameters:
      w - Weight of the arc.
      p - Place involved in the arc.
      t - Transition involved in the arc.
      Returns:
      The created ArcTP object.
      Throws:
      exception.NegativeException - If the weight is negative.
      exception.MissingPlaceException - If the specified Place does not exist.
      exception.MissingTransitionException - If the specified Transition does not exist.
      exception.DuplicateArcException - If an identical arc already exists.

    • removePlace

      public void removePlace(classes.Place p) throws exception.MissingPlaceException, exception.MissingArcException
      Removes a Place from the PetriNet. If linked to any Arc, removes said Arc from the PetriNet.
      Specified by:
      removePlace in interface interfaces.IPetriNet
      Parameters:
      p - The Place to remove.
      Throws:
      exception.MissingPlaceException - If the Place is not found in the net
      exception.MissingArcException - Remnant from removal of all Arcs linked to the Place. By construction it shouldn't be called.
